CustomField.description: In ",9),2))-5))"Use -5 after Daylight Savings Time Ends, -4 during DST.
CustomField.formula: IF( LEN( TEXT(VALUE( Left( right( trim(TEXT(CreatedDate) ),9),2))-5)) = 1, "0"& TEXT(VALUE( Left( right( trim(TEXT(CreatedDate) ),9),2))-5) &":"&mid(right( trim(TEXT(CreatedDate) ),9),4,2), TEXT(VALUE( Left( right( trim(TEXT(CreatedDate) ),9),2))-5) &":"&mid(right( trim(TEXT(CreatedDate) ),9),4,2) )
CustomField.label: Created Time
